title: 90% of qualifying electric-vehicle buyers opt for $7,500 'new clean vehicle' tax credit as upfront payment, Treasury says
description: Most qualifying buyers of new electric vehicles choose to get their tax break as an advance payment instead of waiting until tax season.
headline: 90% of qualifying electric-vehicle buyers opt for $7,500 tax credit as upfront payment, Treasury says

title: Cathie Wood takes a stake in OpenAI, saying it's at the forefront of a 'Cambrian explosion' in AI
description: In a Thursday email to clients, the St. Petersburg, Florida-based asset manager said her ARKÂ Venture Fund has invested in OpenAI as of Wednesday.
headline: Cathie Wood takes a stake in OpenAI, saying it's at the forefront of a 'Cambrian explosion' in AI

title: Stocks making the biggest moves before the bell: JPMorgan, BlackRock, Globe Life and more
description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.
headline: Stocks making the biggest moves before the bell: JPMorgan, BlackRock, Globe Life and more

title: Citigroup tops estimates for first-quarter revenue on better-than-expected Wall Street results
description: Citigroup posted first-quarter revenue that topped estimates, helped by better-than-expected results in the bank's investment banking and trading operations.
headline: Citigroup tops estimates for first-quarter revenue on better-than-expected Wall Street results

title: Wells Fargo earnings top estimates even as lower interest income cuts into profits
description: Wells Fargo on Friday reported first-quarter earnings and revenue that beat Wall Street expectations, despite a decline in net interest income.
headline: Wells Fargo earnings top estimates even as lower interest income cuts into profits
